nodes.text: Apatros was the homeworld of the Sith Lord Darth Bane.

In the new Star Wars canon, Apatros was introduced in the 2017 reference book Star Wars: Geektionary: The Galaxy from A - Z. Apatros originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it first appeared in the 2006 novel Darth Bane: Path of Destruction, written by Drew Karpyshyn.
